About Me

I'm an AI Engineer and Data Scientist specializing in multilingual voice agents, backend development, and applied machine learning. I work across Python, FastAPI, AWS, and modern AI frameworks to build systems that are fast, scalable, and production-ready.

My experience covers AI model pipelines, RAG systems, speech technologies, microservices, data automation, and large-scale analytics. I enjoy solving complex engineering challenges and creating solutions that make real-world operations smarter and more efficient.

Featured Projects

Personal

Real-Time Driver Drowsiness Detection

Developed a CNN model using TensorFlow to detect drowsiness from facial cues. Trained on 2,000 volunteer images achieving 95%+ accuracy. Deployed on Raspberry Pi with camera and buzzer for real-time detection and alerts.

TensorFlow Python CNN Raspberry Pi OpenCV
Personal

CNN-based COVID-19 X-ray Classifier

Trained a CNN from scratch to classify chest X-ray images as COVID-19 or normal. Applied data augmentation and preprocessing for model robustness, achieving 98% accuracy in classifying COVID-19 cases.

TensorFlow CNN Python Image Processing
Personal

AI Medical Training Chatbot - 1st Place Hackathon

Developed an AI-powered chatbot using OpenAI API to simulate patient-doctor interactions for medical students practicing OSCE exam scenarios. Won 1st place at Innov8 Bahrain out of 20 teams.

OpenAI Python NLP Chatbot
Professional

Multilingual Voice Agent Platform

Engineered a low-latency voice agent capable of natural, real-time conversations in English and Arabic dialects (Jordanian, Saudi, Iraqi). Designed the STT → NLP → TTS pipeline using Pipecat and optimized streaming to ensure smooth, responsive dialogue for enterprise deployments.

Python FastAPI Pipecat Speech AI STT/TTS
Professional

RAG-based Knowledge System

Built an enterprise-grade RAG system for multilingual document retrieval and question answering. Implemented embedding models, vector storage with Qdrant, and Haystack pipelines, optimizing retrieval accuracy and latency for production workloads.

Haystack Qdrant Python RAG Vector DB NLP
Professional

Appointment Scheduling & Automation Engine

Built a scheduling and appointment-management backend integrated with voice agents and automated notification flows. Developed FastAPI microservices, AWS-backed storage and email pipelines, and real-time availability logic to enable seamless booking, rescheduling, and customer engagement without manual intervention.

FastAPI AWS S3/SES SQLAlchemy Postgres Automation Microservices
Professional

Automated Chatbot Analytics & NLP Insights Pipeline

Developed an analytics pipeline to interpret large volumes of user–bot interactions. Built Python-based NLP tools to classify queries, detect failure points, and extract behavioral patterns. Automated weekly reporting and insights generation, reducing manual analysis time and enabling data-driven CX improvements.

Python Power BI NLP Automation Analytics

Experience

AI Engineer

Egnite Jun 2025 – Present
  • Engineered end-to-end multilingual AI voice agents using Pipecat, enabling real-time conversational interactions in English and Arabic dialects (Jordanian, Saudi, Iraqi).
  • Designed, containerized, and deployed low-latency STT → NLP → TTS pipelines using Docker on RunPod and AWS, including real-time speech recognition and custom-trained XTTS voices for natural Arabic speech synthesis.
  • Built multilingual RAG systems using Haystack and Qdrant, implementing embedding pipelines and vector search to support accurate contextual retrieval for voice-based interactions.
  • Designed and implemented scalable FastAPI microservices for scheduling, notifications, file handling, and analytics using SQLAlchemy and AWS services (S3, SES).

Data Science Intern

Miral Destinations Feb 2025 – Jun 2025
  • Developed NLP tools to classify chatbot queries, detect failure points, and extract behavioral insights from large user–bot interaction datasets.
  • Automated weekly reporting and analytics workflows using Python, Power BI, and Excel, reducing manual reporting time by 80%.
  • Performed revenue and performance analysis across tenants, uncovering trends that aided leadership in strategic decision-making.
  • Collaborated with engineering and CX teams to improve chatbot performance and reduce bot-to-agent handoff rates.
